original_title: Tupac: Live at the House of Blues
overview: Tupac Shakurâ€™s final performance, the July 4, 1996 concert at the House of Blues. Tupac: Live at The House of Blues is an all out hip house party on stage and a final chance to catch Tupac at the top of his game before his untimely death. Aided by appearances from Snoop Dogg and a booming lossless soundtrack, this one should please hip hop lovers for sure.
title: Tupac: Live at the House of Blues
